targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("usage_iowait"), 1s) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(load1) as short,mean(load5) as medium,mean(load15) as long FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(running) as running, mean(blocked) as blocked, mean(sleeping) as sleeping, mean(stopped) as stopped, mean(zombies) as zombies, mean(paging) as paging, mean(unknown) as unknown FROM "processes" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

list.label: Mountpoint
list.name: mountpoint
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: Network interface
list.name: netif
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$server/
